code: import _classCallCheck from"C:\\Users\\HSONNL\\Desktop\\myProject\\NCOV-19\\Repo\\NCOV-19Manager\\client\\node_modules\\babel-preset-react-app\\node_modules\\@babel\\runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from"axios";var GETALL="/api/admin/all";var DELETE="/api/admin/";var UPDATE="/api/admin/";var ADDSHIFTTODOCTOR="/api/admin/add-doctor-to-shift/";var AdminAPI=function AdminAPI(){_classCallCheck(this,AdminAPI);this.getAll=function(token,response,error){axios.get(GETALL,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.deleteUser=function(token,idUser,response,error){axios({method:'DELETE',url:DELETE+idUser,headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.updateUser=function(token,idUser,formData,response,error){var data={"email":formData.get("email")};axios.put(UPDATE+idUser,data,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.addShiftToDoctor=function(token,idDoctor,formData,response,error){var data={"idShift":formData.get("idShift")};axios.post(ADDSHIFTTODOCTOR+idDoctor,data,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};};export{AdminAPI as default};
